amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to report to Congress on acquisitions made by the Department of Agriculture of articles, materials, or supplies manufactured outside the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2122 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2122 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To require the Secretary of Agriculture to report to Congress on acquisitions made by the Department of Agriculture of articles, materials, or supplies manufactured outside the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2122 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2122 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Feingold.
